alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 29 at 2:55PM PST until February 02 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 13 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County
